message.entry: Pack numeric matrix into a Simulink image.
Unpack numeric matrix from a Simulink image.
In block ''{0}'', input matrix must be 3-D ([rows, columns, channels]) or 2-D (single channel) for image data.
In block ''{0}'', parameter ''OutputDimensions'' must specify a 3-D ([rows, columns, channels]) or 2-D (single channel) matrix.
In block ''{0}'', the last dimension of a 3-D input matrix (number of channels) must be less than 4.
In block ''{0}'', the last dimension of a 3-D matrix (number of channels) specified by parameter ''OutputDimensions'' must be less than 4.
Dimensions of input matrix ''{0}'' must match the size and channels of output image type ''{1}''.
Dimensions of output matrix ''{0}'' must match the size and channels of input image type ''{1}''.
Data type of input matrix ''{0}'' must match the base type of output image type ''{1}''.
Output data type of block ''{0}'' must be a Simulink image type.
Input data type of block ''{0}'' must be a Simulink image type.
Output meta-data of specified Simulink data type.
Output attributes of input Simulink image signal.
Block ''{0}'' supports only Simulink image data type ('Simulink.ImageType').
